channel.title: Package Management on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community
channel.description: Recent content in Package Management on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: The case of potentially broken Package Management for Windows 10 Insiders
item.description: I’ve been running in the Windows Insiders fast ring since it was incepted and went from Windows 8.1 to Windows 10 November update with all the insider builds in between.

item.title: PowerShell OneGet: Gist-As-A-Package
item.description: This article will cover a new powerful feature delivered in the PowerShell 5.0 November Preview. This feature is OneGet. OneGet is a unified package manager for package management systems.

item.title: Chocolatey and PowerShell – Revolutionize Windows, Part II
item.description: In the first installment we covered installing both a tool and an application. If the possibilities of Chocolatey have not yet started to solidify for you, hopefully this next segment will.

item.title: Chocolatey and PowerShell – Revolutionize Windows, Part I
item.description: Ten years ago we did things a certain way. Five years ago we thought the things we did ten years ago were antiquated.
